Adedayo Agarau bụ onye Naijiria na-ede abụ onye edemede na onye nchịkwa nka
Agarau bụ onye otu UnSerious Collective
Ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Agbowo, akwụkwọ akụkọ agụmagụ Afrika
Ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ ntọala na IceFloe Press, Canada dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ Voice International ọhụrụ na onye njikwa nweta Chapbook African
Agarau chepụtara ma dezie akwụkwọ Memento: Anthology of Contemporary Nigerian Poetry

Agarau bụ onye dere akwụkwọ edemede atọ bụ: For Boys Who Went, 2016, The Origin of Name nke a họọrọ maka igbe chapbook nke Kwame Dawes na Chris Abani dezigharịrị na ago 2020, na The Arrival of Rain, nke Vegetarian Alcoholic Press bipụtara na 2020. Ihe odide ya na egosiputa mkparịta ụka banyere ohere nke ọtụtụ ndị edemede Naijiria nke ọgbọ ọhụrụ ma dọta nyocha dị ukwuu site na magazin dị ka Open Country, YesPoetry, na AfroCritik.

E gosipụtara abụ Agarau na akwụkwọ akụkọ na ịntanetị na nke mbipụta gụnyere Poetry Magazine, World Literature Today, Iowa Review, Poet Lore, Poetry Society of America, Frontier Poetry, Lolwe, Olongo Africa, Anmly, TheShore Poetry. E bipụtara edemede ya na Isele Magazine, Trampset, Icefloe Press na YesPoetry. A kọwapụtara ma ọ bụ gbaa ya ajụjụ ọnụ na nhiwe mba ụwa gụnyere Africritik, Africa na Dialogue, Literature Voices, Nanty Greens, Libretto, Poets in Nigeria, Isele Magazine, Splash FM, Shamsrumi. A họpụtara Agarau maka Brunel African Poetry Prize n’afo 2022, onye natara Stanley ihe nrite International Research na Robert Hayden Fellowship. Agarau e debere Memento: Anthology of Contemporary Nigerian Poetry na Nigerian National Poetry Prize.
